results.title: A Potter's world
results.brief_description: The craftsmanship of Bernard Leach who, after a number of years in the East, established a pottery in Cornwall. The influence of the Orient on his work is indicated.
results.description: The craftsmanship of Bernard Leach who, after a number of years in the East, established a pottery in Cornwall. The influence of the Orient on his work is indicated.
description_for_label: The craftsmanship of Bernard Leach who, after a number of years in the East, established a pottery in Cornwall. The influence of the Orient on his work is indicated.

results.title: A Pot of message
results.brief_description: Argues that Australians eat and drink too much and do not exercise enough. Because much of modern food is highly refined it lacks basic nutrition. Although there is a growing awareness of the need to eat more natural food it must be remembered that health foods and vitamin pills are not really the answer.
results.description: Argues that Australians eat and drink too much and do not exercise enough. Because much of modern food is highly refined it lacks basic nutrition. Although there is a growing awareness of the need to eat more natural food it must be remembered that health foods and vitamin pills are not really the answer.
